mapper.select: /* getListSdoExceptGeom */ SELECT SUBSTR(bjcd, 1, 2) AS sdo_code, name FROM sk_sdo WHERE bjcd IN ('2900000000', '4500000000', '4600000000') ORDER BY name
/* getListSggBySdoExceptGeom */ SELECT SUBSTR(bjcd, 3, 3) AS sgg_code, name FROM sk_sgg WHERE bjcd LIKE #{sdoCode} || '%' ORDER BY name
/* getListCentroidBridge */ SELECT brg_nam, grade, ST_X(ST_Centroid(wkb_geometry)) AS longitude, ST_Y(ST_Centroid(wkb_geometry)) AS latitude FROM bridge
/* getListMngOrg */ SELECT DISTINCT mng_org FROM bridge WHERE NOT mng_org is NULL ORDER BY mng_org

/* getListBridgeAll */ SELECT DISTINCT A.ogc_fid as gid, A.brg_nam, A.end_amd, A.grade FROM bridge A LEFT JOIN sk_sdo B ON A.fac_sido = B.name LEFT JOIN sk_sgg C ON A.fac_sgg = C.name ORDER BY A.brg_nam

/* getBridge */ SELECT ogc_fid as gid, ufid, fac_num, brg_nam, mng_org, fac_sido, fac_sgg, fac_emd, fac_ri, fac_gra, end_amd, dsn_wet, brg_len, brg_hit, eff_wid, tot_wid, spa_cnt, max_len, tra_cnt, usp_rep, dpi_rep, ST_AsText(wkb_geometry) as geom, gru_num, bridge_cm, bridge_lcc, grade, model, ST_X(ST_Centroid(wkb_geometry)) AS longitude, ST_Y(ST_Centroid(wkb_geometry)) AS latitude, (SELECT COALESCE(data_id, 0) FROM data_info WHERE data_key = fac_num) AS dataId FROM bridge WHERE ogc_fid = #{gid}
